title: Understanding USAG Gymnastics Levels: A Complete Guide (2024) - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center
description: Master the USAG gymnastics levels from beginner to elite. Learn skill requirements, competition structures, and training commitments for each level in this 2024 guide.
content: Understanding USAG Gymnastics Levels: A Complete Guide (2024) As a parent or aspiring gymnast, navigating the USA Gymnastics (USAG) level system can be both exciting and overwhelming. This comprehensive guide will walk you through the intricacies of each level, helping you understand the progression and requirements for gymnasts in 2024. Picture your child mastering a perfect cartwheel, then progressing to back handsprings, and eventually performing complex aerial maneuvers. The USAG level system is designed to guide this journey, ensuring safe and steady advancement in skills and competition readiness. Ready to see where your gymnast fits in the USAG level system? Explore the programs at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja to find the perfect fit for your aspiring athlete! On This Page Overview of USAG Gymnastics Levels The USAG level system is structured to provide a clear pathway for gymnasts to develop their skills and compete at appropriate levels. Here’s a brief overview: Developmental Levels : Levels 1-3 Compulsory Levels : Levels 4-5 Optional Levels : Levels 6-10 Elite Level : Beyond Level 10 Let’s dive deeper into each category and level. Developmental Levels (1-3) These levels focus on building a strong foundation of basic skills and are typically non-competitive. Level 1 Focus: Basic body positions, simple dance elements, and introductory skills on all apparatus. Key Skills: Forward roll, cartwheel, basic jumps and leaps. Level 2 Focus: Expanding on Level 1 skills with more complex combinations. Key Skills: Back roll, handstand, round-off, pull-over on bars. Level 3 Focus: Introducing more dynamic movements and beginning acrobatic skills. Key Skills: Backbend kickover, back handspring (floor), kip swing (bars). Compulsory Levels (4-5) These levels introduce competition with standardized routines for all gymnasts. Level 4 Competition: First required competitive level with standardized routines. Key Skills: Back walkover, stride jump, cast to horizontal (bars). Level 5 Competition: Continued standardized routines with increased difficulty. Key Skills: Back handspring (beam), flyaway dismount (bars), front handspring (vault). Optional Levels (6-10) These levels allow for personalized routines within specific skill requirements. Level 6 Focus: Transition to optional routines with specific skill requirements. Key Skills: Giant swings (bars), back tuck (floor), more complex dance elements. Level 7 Focus: Increased difficulty in optional routines. Key Skills: Clear hip circle (bars), aerial cartwheel (beam), front tuck (floor). Level 8 Focus: Introduction of C-level skills. Key Skills: Release moves on bars, back layout (floor), more complex series on beam. Level 9 Focus: Higher level of difficulty and execution. Key Skills: Multiple release moves on bars, advanced tumbling combinations. Level 10 Focus: Highest level of optional competition before Elite. Key Skills: Complex release combinations on bars, difficult tumbling passes, high-level dance elements. Elite Level The Elite program is for gymnasts aspiring to compete at national and international levels, including the Olympics. Junior Elite: Ages 11-15 Senior Elite: Ages 16+ Elite gymnasts perform significantly more difficult skills and routines compared to Level 10. Progression Through Levels Advancement through levels is based on skill mastery and meeting specific score requirements in competitions. Here are some key points: Skill Mastery : Gymnasts must demonstrate proficiency in all skills required for their current level before moving up. Score Requirements : Many gyms and regions require gymnasts to achieve certain all-around scores to advance to the next level. Age Considerations : While there are no strict age requirements for most levels, there are general age ranges where gymnasts typically compete at each level. Individual Pace : Every gymnast progresses at their own rate. It’s common for gymnasts to spend multiple seasons at the same level. Competition Structure Understanding the competition structure, and gymnastics teams , is crucial for gymnasts and parents: Local Meets : Usually the first type of competition for lower levels. State Championships : Gymnasts qualify based on scores from local meets. Regional Championships : Top performers from state competitions advance to regionals. National Championships : For Level 9, 10, and Elite gymnasts who qualify through regional competitions. Training Commitments As gymnasts progress through levels, training commitments typically increase: Levels 1-3 : 1-3 hours per week Levels 4-5 : 6-12 hours per week Levels 6-8 : 12-20 hours per week Levels 9-10 : 20-30 hours per week Elite : 30-40 hours per week Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers class schedules tailored to each level, ensuring your gymnast receives the appropriate training time for their skill level. Choosing the Right Level Selecting the appropriate level for a gymnast involves several factors: Skill Proficiency : The gymnast should be comfortable with all skills required for their level. Physical Readiness : Consider strength, flexibility, and endurance. Mental Preparedness : Higher levels require increased focus and ability to handle pressure. Time Commitment : Ensure the training schedule aligns with other life commitments. Long-term Goals : Consider the gymnast’s aspirations in the sport. Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers a variety of gymnastics programs designed to accommodate gymnasts at every level, from beginners to elite competitors. Frequently Asked Questions Q: How long does it typically take to progress through levels? A: Progression varies greatly among individuals. Some gymnasts may spend one season at a level, while others may stay at the same level for several years. The focus should be on skill mastery rather than rapid advancement. Q: Can a gymnast skip levels? A: While it’s possible, it’s not common or generally recommended. Each level builds upon skills learned in previous levels, ensuring a strong foundation. Q: What if my child wants to do gymnastics recreationally? A: Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers recreational programs that teach gymnastics skills without the pressure of competition. These programs often follow a modified version of the level system. Q: How do I know if my child is ready for Elite level training? A: Elite training is extremely demanding and is typically only suitable for gymnasts who have excelled at Level 10 and have aspirations for national or international competition. Coaches usually identify potential Elite gymnasts based on exceptional skill, dedication, and physical aptitude. Q: Are there differences in levels for male and female gymnasts? A: Yes, while the concept of progressive levels is similar, the specific skills and apparatus differ for boys and girls gymnastics. Men’s gymnastics has its own level system with different apparatus and skill requirements. Understanding the USAG gymnastics levels is crucial for both gymnasts and their supporters. It provides a clear pathway for skill development, ensures safety through progressive learning, and helps set realistic goals. Remember, the journey through gymnastics levels is unique for each athlete, and the focus should always be on personal growth, enjoyment of the sport, and overall well-being. Whether your gymnast is just starting out or aiming for Elite status, the level system offers a structured approach to achieving their gymnastics dreams. With dedication, proper training, and support, your gymnast can thrive at any level they choose to pursue. Curious about which USAG level is right for your gymnast? Contact Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja to have your athlete evaluated and placed in the appropriate program for their skill level and goals!

children.title: Our Staff - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center
children.description: Our Staff - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: Huntington Ms Oksana USAG Head Coach Elite Gymnast age 12-15yrs National Team Member of USSR Awarded Master of Sport USSR National Champion of Belarus 27 years of coaching experience (Belarus, Egypt, USA) 15 years of coaching at Club Champion, California Coached several USAG National Champions in California Two Athletes currently on the Brown University and Cornell University Teams Ms Bianca Preschool Director, Recreational Director & Facility Manager Studied childhood education. South African Champions Dancer. Choreographer for school Theater Program. Ms Jessica Party Director Graduated with a bachelor’s degree in General Education and a master’s degree in Special Education. CPR/AED Certified Coaching gymnastics at Gold Medal since 2016 Coach for both USAG and IGC teams Ms Doris Ninja Director Mr Dario Club Team & Party Director Working for Gold Medal since 2018 Party Director since 2019 & Club Team Director since 2021. Coach of USAIGC & Club Team CPR/AED certified & former EMT-B Athlete in a variety of sports since the age of 3 Graduated St. Joseph’s University in 2023 with a degree in Biology and minor in Chemistry Ms Sam Office Manager Attended Suffolk County Community College and majored in Business Administration with a 3.8 GPA. Member of Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society. Pursuing PMI Project Management Professional Certification. Took Martial Arts classes and competed in tournaments from ages 7-12, advanced from a white belt to a second degree brown belt. CPR and AED Certified. Mr Ivan – USAG Head Coach Ms Michele USAIGC Team Director Bronze level state champions 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008. Silver level state Champions 2006, 2007 2008 Gold Level State Champions 2008. Coaches gymnastics for Port Jefferson HS Gold Level National Championships All Around Gold Level World Champion 2013 Gold Level World Championships 2013 Ms Caitie Developmental Director Competitive dancer for over 16 years. Working for Gold Medal over 7 years now Has taught dance & Acro for over 6 years Attending Suffolk Community College to become a Special Needs Educator in the near future. children.title: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes in Smithtown, NY | Gold Medal Gymnastics
children.description: Join us at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja's state-of-the-art facility in Smithtown. Classes for ages 3mo-18yrs, from recreational to competitive levels.
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Smithtown, NY Sign up for Classes in Smithtown 253 West Main Street, Smithtown, NY 11787 Phone: (631) 366-GOLD (4653) Email: smithtown@gmgc.com SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS The Gold Medal Smithtown Experience Welcome to Gold Medal Gymnastics Center of Smithtown, Long Island; part of the renowned Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja family. We have been developing young athletes across Long Island since 1973. Our Smithtown facility is one of 7 state of the art gyms that combine over half a century of gymnastics excellence in a modern, unparalleled environment for children to grow, learn, and excel. Included in each gym is our premier Gold Medal Ninja training course. Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG Our recently renovated facility in Smithtown stands as a testament to our commitment to athletic excellence and childhood development. We've created specialized training spaces that cater to every stage of a child's journey, from their first forward roll to advanced competitive routines. What distinguishes our Smithtown location is the exceptional caliber of our coaching staff. Our program directors bring together Olympic-level expertise and dedicated teaching experience. Under the leadership of a former USSR National Team member and Master of Sport, our athletes receive world-class instruction that has guided numerous students to national championships and prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Smithtown Location and Directions Our Smithtown facility is conveniently located at 253 West Main Street in Smithtown, offering easy access for families throughout the area. Hours of Operation Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Saturday: 8:30 AM - 2:00 PM Summer hours: vary The facility features ample parking and a welcoming environment for both athletes and families. Contact Information Phone: (631) 366-4653 Email: smithtown@gmgc.com Address: 253 West Main Street, Smithtown, NY 11787 Directions Take either LIE (Exit 53) or Northern Pkwy(Exit 450 to Sunken Meadow Pkwy NORTH. Continue approx. 2 miles to Jericho Turnpike-Route 25 EAST-(Exit SM3E). Follow Rt 25 for about 4 miles. You will pass a large statue of the Smithtown bull on left. Gold Medal will be a red brick building on your left immediately after Stop and Shop supermarket. Next to Dunkin Donuts. July & August Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 1:00pm Saturday: Closed Sunday: Closed for Parties Fall Hours Monday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Tuesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Wednesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Thursday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Friday: 9:15am – 7:30pm Saturday: 8:00am – 2:00pm Sunday: Closed for Parties Gymnastics Classes Offered in Smithtown Our comprehensive program selection at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja of Smithtown, NY, ensures every child finds their perfect path to athletic achievement. From preschool gymnastics to advanced competitive training, our programs are designed to develop strong, confident athletes. Preschool Gymnastics Our award-winning preschool gymnastics program creates an enriching environment where children ages 3 months to 6 years develop fundamental movement skills. We combine structured activities with imaginative play to establish strong foundations for future athletic success. Programs include Parent & Tot/Mommy & Me classes, Bronze Babies, and Super Silvers. Enroll Now - Preschool Gymnastics Classes Recreational Gymnastics Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja’s recreational gymnastics classes of Smithtown foster physical literacy through expert instruction for children ages 5 and above. Each 90-minute class builds strength, flexibility, and confidence while maintaining an atmosphere of enjoyment and achievement. Our recreational program includes instruction on all Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, floor exercise, and vault. Enroll Now - Recreational Gymnastics Classes Advanced Gymnastics Our advanced gymnastics programs carry forward Gold Medal’s tradition of excellence under the guidance of our USAG Head Coach. From Mini-Team to Elite training, we provide pathways for every aspiring competitive gymnast. Our advanced programs have successfully placed athletes in prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Enroll Now - Advanced Gymnastics Classes Ninja Warrior Training Our innovative ninja warrior program represents the evolution of athletic training at Gold Medal. Combining gymnastics fundamentals with obstacle course challenges, we’ve created an exciting environment where children build both physical capabilities and mental resilience. Programs are available for all ages, from Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years) to Advanced Ninja training. Enroll Now - Ninja Warrior Classes Tumbling & Trampoline Perfect for cheerleaders, dancers, and athletes, our tumbling program focuses on essential acrobatic elements. Under expert guidance, students progress through beginner flipping class, advanced flipping class, and Dancenastics, mastering skills like back handsprings and aerials. Our state-of-the-art facility includes spring floors, professional trampolines, and foam pits for safe skill progression. Enroll Now - Tumbling Classes Exclusive Programs Experience personalized instruction tailored to your child’s specific goals with our exclusive One-on-One classes or create your own Mini Group (2-4 students) with friends. These customized sessions allow students to focus on their chosen skills and events, with flexible scheduling during off-peak hours. Perfect for accelerated learning or focused skill development. Enroll Now - Private Gymnastics Classes Smithtown Photo Gallery What Smithtown Families Say About Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the experiences of our Gold Medal families. Recent reviews from local parents consistently highlight our facility's impact. Parents consistently praise our experienced coaching staff, notably celebrating the patient and enthusiastic guidance in our preschool program and the technical expertise in our competitive tracks. Families particularly value our facility and the visible progress their children achieve. Many reviews emphasize how our programs have enhanced their children's confidence, strength, and social skills, with several families noting years of continued enrollment and multiple children participating in our programs. Smithtown Gymnastics Classes SIGN UP FOR CLASSES > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > Join Our Email List STAY IN THE LOOP > Follow Us on Instagram GET CONNECTED > Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers world-class training with coaches, trainers, and support staff dedicated to helping gymnasts of all levels achieve their best. We proudly support aspiring gymnasts across seven locations in New York and New Jersey. Our programs include preschool classes, advanced classes, recreational gymnastics, ninja lessons, tumbling and trampoline lessons, as well as camps, events, birthday parties, and professional competitive teams. Centereach Garden City Huntington Levittown Rocky Point Smithtown Short Hills, NJ

children.description: Explore gymnastics classes and training at GMGC in Garden City, NY. Enroll in our top-rated programs for all ages and skill levels. Call (516) 357-3636 to join now!
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Garden City, NY SIGN UP FOR CLASSES AT THIS LOCATION 1100 Stewart Ave, Garden City, NY 11530 SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS Phone: (516) 357-3636 Email: gardencity@gmgc.com Classes offered at this location: Preschool Gymnastics: Bronze Babies (walking to 3 years): Parent-assisted classes Super Silvers (3-5 years): Basic gymnastics in a fun environment Little Explorers (3-12 months): Introductory class for babies Click here to sign up! Recreational Gymnastics: Intro to Rec (5 years): 5 year olds will get an early introduction to gymnastics equipment Girls Gymnastics (6 years+): 90 minute program focusing on 4 olympic events Girls & Boys Gymnastics (6-18 years): Focuses on flexibility, strength, and self-esteem Gold Medal Ninja: High-energy classes for children up to 12 years old Click here to sign up! Advanced Gymnastics: Gold Medalists (5-7 years): Learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 2 & 3 Mini-Team (5-8 years): Introduction to competitive gymnastics training while in a fun environment Pre-Team (8+years): Master new skills at an accelerated pace High School Group Program (14+ years): Opportunity for high school students to utilize our space to practice Click here to sign up! Specialized Gymnastics: Tumbling and Trampoline: Concentrates on floor skills and aerial techniques Dancenastics: Focuses on tumbling and acrobatic skills used in dance Beginner Flipping Class: Build strength, balance and flexibility Advanced Flipping Class: Learn how to do a back tuck, side aerials and layouts Click here to sign up! Ninja Classes: Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years): basic ninja classes Little Ninja (3-5 years): introductory ninja classes Ninja Kids (6 years+): Learn flips, bars, parkour and more Advanced Ninja (6 years+): Advanced obstacle course training Ninja Teams: tournament style ninja competition Warrior Tumbling Class: Ninja warrior inspired experience with obstacle courses Click here to sign up! The Garden City location also offers birthday parties , summer camps , and special events throughout the year. Merge onto Merchants Concourse then drive straight through traffic light. Building is immediately on right corner after traffic light. Look for International Buffet. Parking is in the far rear of the building. 1100 Stewart Ave, Garden City, NY 11530 Phone (516) 357-3636

Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. Your birthday party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Child too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. Call for more information or Book Now: CALL TODAY! children.description: Summer Camp - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: SUMMER CAMP & CLASSES School is Out, Now its all about FUN and GREAT times at Camp! Gold Medal Gymnastics Summer Camp signups are happening NOW! Signup today for as little as $65/day. Click ENROLL NOW! Button Below. SIGN UP FOR ONE OR MULTIPLE WEEKS! BOYS & GIRLS 3-12 YEARS OLD CHOOSE 3, 4 or 5 DAYS A WEEK Each weekly gymnastics/ninja camp has a different theme with special events and activities that the campers will love, plus plenty of gymnastics instruction indoors and outdoors. Sign up for one week or multiple weeks! Ages 3-12 years (must be potty trained) We’ll have the campers doing GYMNASTICS, NINJA and TUMBLING, plus arts and crafts, and visits from some very special characters. Gymnastics or Ninja camp pricing is now as low as $65/day! Your camper will gain gymnastics skills plus make new friends and have a blast! Parents choose our camps year after year because of our caring, qualified instructors. Keep your kids active this summer and sign them up for camp today! Pick your days each week! Choose 3, 4, or 5 days a week, 9:30am to 12:30pm in our fully air-conditioned facilities. Campers bring in a snack. Ice Cream Truck Fridays for all campers! NEW! Lunch Bunch Extended Option – 1 hour = $20 per day/per child. Pizza Wednesdays! ENROLL NOW FOR CAMP! Centereach, NY Camp Garden City, NY Camp Huntington, NY Camp Levittown, NY Camp Rocky Point, NY Camp Smithtown, NY Camp Short Hills, NJ Camp - NEW! ENROLL NOW FOR CLASSES! children.title: Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. Your birthday party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Child too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. Call for more information or Book Now: CALL TODAY! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule BOOK NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Ninja Parties How about an awesome birthday party for that little Ninja! These parties teach basic skills from our trained Ninja Staff, utilizing our state-of-the-art equipment with fun challenging obstacle courses! We set up courses for time and speed so that you can test your strength and compete with your friends in a fun and safe space! A Ninja Birthday Party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Ninja too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. children.title: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes in Centereach, NY | Gold Medal Gymnastics
children.description: Join us at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja's state-of-the-art facility in Centereach. Classes for ages 3mo-18yrs, from recreational to competitive levels.
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Centereach, NY Sign up for Classes in Centereach 1752 Middle Country Road, Centereach, NY 11720 Phone: (631) 981-GOLD (4653) Email: centereach@gmgc.com SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS The Gold Medal Centereach Experience Welcome to Gold Medal Gymnastics Center of Centereach, Long Island; part of the renowned Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja family. We have been developing young athletes across Long Island since 1973. Our Centereach facility is one of 7 state of the art gyms that combine over half a century of gymnastics excellence in a modern, unparalleled environment for children to grow, learn, and excel. Included in each gym is our premier Gold Medal Ninja training course. Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG Our established facility at 1752 Middle Country Road in Centereach stands as a testament to our commitment to athletic excellence and childhood development. Conveniently located just off the Long Island Expressway at Exit 62, we've created specialized training spaces that cater to every stage of a child's journey, from their first forward roll to advanced competitive routines. What distinguishes our Centereach location is the exceptional caliber of our coaching staff and comprehensive program offerings. Our facility provides the full spectrum of Gold Medal programming, from our Little Explorers classes for babies as young as 3 months to our competitive team programs for advanced athletes. Under expert instruction, our athletes receive world-class training that has guided numerous students to national championships and prestigious university programs across the country. Centereach Location and Directions Our Centereach facility is conveniently located at 1752 Middle Country Road, offering easy access for families throughout Suffolk County and eastern Long Island Contact Information Phone: (631) 981-GOLD (4653) Email: centereach@gmgc.com Address: 1752 Middle Country Road, Centereach, NY 11720 From Eastern Long Island Long Island Expressway (495) to route 97 North Nicolls Rd (exit 62), Exit at Route 25 West, (Left on Middle Country Rd). Take Middle Country Rd for approximately 1/4 mile and gym will be on the left. From NYC, Upstate, Nassau Long Island Expressway East (495) to route 97 North Nicolls Rd (exit 62), Exit at Route 25 West,(Middle Country Rd). Take Middle Country Rd for approximately 1/4 mile and gym will be on the left. July & August Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 1:00pm Saturday: Closed Sunday: Closed for Parties Fall Hours Monday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Tuesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Wednesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Thursday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Friday: 9:15am – 7:30pm Saturday: 8:00am – 2:00pm Sunday: Closed for Parties Gymnastics Classes Offered in Centereach Our comprehensive program selection at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja of Centereach, NY, ensures every child finds their perfect path to athletic achievement. From preschool gymnastics to advanced competitive training, our programs are designed to develop strong, confident athletes. Preschool Gymnastics Our award-winning preschool gymnastics program creates an enriching environment where children ages 3 months to 6 years develop fundamental movement skills. We combine structured activities with imaginative play to establish strong foundations for future athletic success. Programs include Parent & Tot/Mommy & Me classes, Bronze Babies, and Super Silvers. Enroll Now - Preschool Gymnastics Classes Recreational Gymnastics Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja’s recreational gymnastics classes of Centereach foster physical literacy through expert instruction for children ages 5 and above. Each 90-minute class builds strength, flexibility, and confidence while maintaining an atmosphere of enjoyment and achievement. Our recreational program includes instruction on all Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, floor exercise, and vault. Enroll Now - Recreational Gymnastics Classes Advanced Gymnastics Our advanced gymnastics programs carry forward Gold Medal’s tradition of excellence under the guidance of our USAG Head Coach. From Mini-Team to Elite training, we provide pathways for every aspiring competitive gymnast. Our advanced programs have successfully placed athletes in prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Enroll Now - Advanced Gymnastics Classes Ninja Warrior Training Our innovative ninja warrior program represents the evolution of athletic training at Gold Medal. Combining gymnastics fundamentals with obstacle course challenges, we’ve created an exciting environment where children build both physical capabilities and mental resilience. Programs are available for all ages, from Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years) to Advanced Ninja training. Enroll Now - Ninja Warrior Classes Tumbling & Trampoline Perfect for cheerleaders, dancers, and athletes, our tumbling program focuses on essential acrobatic elements. Under expert guidance, students progress through beginner flipping class, advanced flipping class, and Dancenastics, mastering skills like back handsprings and aerials. Our state-of-the-art facility includes spring floors, professional trampolines, and foam pits for safe skill progression. Enroll Now - Tumbling Classes Exclusive Programs Experience personalized instruction tailored to your child’s specific goals with our exclusive One-on-One classes or create your own Mini Group (2-4 students) with friends. These customized sessions allow students to focus on their chosen skills and events, with flexible scheduling during off-peak hours. Perfect for accelerated learning or focused skill development. Enroll Now - Private Gymnastics Classes Centereach Photo Gallery What Centereach Families Say About Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the experiences of our Gold Medal families. Recent reviews from local parents consistently highlight our facility's impact. Parents consistently praise our experienced coaching staff, notably celebrating the patient and enthusiastic guidance in our preschool program and the technical expertise in our competitive tracks. Families particularly value our well-equipped facility and the visible progress their children achieve. Many reviews emphasize how our programs have enhanced their children's confidence, strength, and social skills, with several families noting years of continued enrollment and multiple children participating in our programs. Centereach Gymnastics Classes SIGN UP FOR CLASSES > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > Join Our Email List STAY IN THE LOOP > Follow Us on Instagram GET CONNECTED > Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers world-class training with coaches, trainers, and support staff dedicated to helping gymnasts of all levels achieve their best. We proudly support aspiring gymnasts across seven locations in New York and New Jersey. Our programs include preschool classes, advanced classes, recreational gymnastics, ninja lessons, tumbling and trampoline lessons, as well as camps, events, birthday parties, and professional competitive teams. Centereach Garden City Huntington Levittown Rocky Point Smithtown Short Hills, NJ

children.title: PreSchool Programs - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: PreSchool Programs - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: PRE-SCHOOL GYMNASTICS Our preschool gym (Pregym) program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our specialized preschool area's have the latest "kid-sized" version of gymnastics equipment for classes run by our highly trained instructors. Classes are designed to increase physical strength, develop motor skills, and channel all of their energy! Children are divided into groups based on age, maturity, and skill level. Classes will boost their self-esteem and self-confidence through our positive and encouraging teaching techniques. AGES 3 MONTHS TO 6 YEARS FUN & STRUCTURED LEARNING STATE OF THE ART PRE-EQUIPMENT This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Crawling, Standing, & Walking Skills Building Body Strength Parent & Child Bonding Little Explorers prepares the students for the Bronze Babies Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, N Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! An introduction to the structure and discipline of preschool and gymnastics classes. This class creates a safe environment for your child to jump on the trampoline, climb on rock walls, zoom down slides, and hang on bars. Classes will include a small portion of structured gymnastics and a large portion of fun, games, music, and open play. Watch your child grow to love physical activity and see their attention span develop more and more each class. Activities will include bubble time, parachute fun, foam pit games, belt flying, and much more! This class is a great opportunity for parents to bond with each other and their children. Open Play Environment Balance, Coordination & Flexibility Music, Climbing, Games & More Parent & Child Bonding Busy Bees prepares your child for either the Bronze Babies or Silver Stars Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Structured Class Setting Motor Skill Development Take Turns & Sharing Parent & Child Bonding Bronze Babies prepares the students for Silver Stars Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This 55-minute pre-school gym program teaches basic gymnastics integrated into a fun game-like environment this class introduces parental separation fostering independence and self-esteem. Every class starts off with a musical warm-up and stretch to motivate and introduce gymnastics. Children will be taught two Olympic events such as beam and bars long with various jumps on the trampoline. Every week the children learn new skills including cartwheels, handstands, forward rolls, backward rolls, jumps, vaulting, and more. Through these exercise’s they’ll gain strength, balance, flexibility, coordination, and self-esteem. Becoming More Independent Increase Self Esteem & Confidence Balance, Strength, & Flexibility Silver Stars prepares students for either the Super Silvers, Intro to Rec, or Girls Gymnastics Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & Rock wall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Contact the office for more details! Intro to Rec. prepares students for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This pre-school gym program is for kids who have mastered the basics in their preschool classes. Kids are challenged even more in the same nurturing environment. Emphasis on using correct form and increasing strength prepares your gymnast for the Gold Medalist program. Gymnasts are introduced to levels 1 and 2 of the USAG Junior Olympic Program. They start to go on the larger gymnastics equipment at an earlier age. Preschool gym students begin to connect skills in a row while adding perfect form and posture to their gymnastics. Class is 90 minutes and includes trampoline. **Evaluation is required to enroll** Contact the office for more details! Super Silvers prepares your child for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This preschool gym program is designed for children who show a special interest and wish to pursue gymnastics as a sport. Developing the core basics for a gymnast is crucial to their success in the Junior Olympic program. Gymnasts in this program will learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 3 including all the latest training techniques that are set forth by the USAG National staff. These classes are more physically challenging while maintaining a fun game-like environment. Kids learn more advanced gymnastics skills and gain a sense of pride in their accomplishments. They have the option in participating in their own beginner-level gymnastic competition! This competition is labeled a “fun meet” because it is an unofficial exhibition designed to give athletes a positive experience when they perform in front of a crowd. The classes are 2 hours and meet twice a week. **Evaluation is required** Contact the office for more details! Gold Medalist prepares students for the Mini/Pre Team or the Accelerated Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Get some friends together and have your next playdate at Gold Medal Gymnastics Center. Enjoy a supervised open play atmosphere on our state of the art equipment. Ask our office for details. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule Watch our Pre-Schoolers in action! Our preschool gym program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our state of the art facilities are kid-sized and run by highly trained instructors. children.title: Recreational Gymnastics - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Recreational Gymnastics - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: RECREATIONAL GYMNASTICS If you want your child to learn cores skills to help them in every sport, then the recreation program is a great place to start. All classes are structured around making every child stronger, more flexible, and to improve overall coordination. Our fun & positive learning system creates an atmosphere of encouragement and excitement to keep the children engaged during the entire class. Your child will learn at their own pace on all of the olympic events, make lasting friendships, and build their self esteem with every skill they achieve! AGES 5 YEARS AND UP GREAT FOR BOYS AND GIRLS STATE OF THE ART FACILITIES World class programs, held in our state of the art facilities for boys and girls ages 5 and up. Watch our video to learn more! This recreational gymnastics class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & rockwall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Early Introduction to Recreational Gymnastics Learn basic skills and safety with full size bars, beams & vault Introduces skills for tumbling, trampoline, tumble trak & rockwall Intro to Rec. prepares students for Girls Gymnastics Class or Accelerated Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Beginner & Intermediate This 90-minute class is based on the 4 Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting and floor exercise. Each week kids will be learning new skills in our state of the art facilities. Lesson plans are designed to keep kids moving the entire class, improving their over-all fitness and keeping it fun! Gold Medal offers a nurturing environment where students are encouraged to progress at their own unique pace: from forward rolls and cartwheels to front and back handsprings. Lessons always include trampoline or tumble track. Kids increase their flexibility and strength, boost their self-esteem, and gain a sense of pride in their achievements. Classes are 90 minutes long and are divided into groups with their friends and also by age and ability. Class focuses on balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting & floor exercise Increases flexibility, strength and boosts self esteem while having fun Great for all sports Learn forward rolls, cartwheels, front and back handsprings Kids are grouped with friends by age and ability Girls Gymnastics prepares students for Accelerated Gymnastics. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! children.title: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes in Huntington, NY | Gold Medal Gymnastics
children.description: Join us at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja's state-of-the-art facility in Huntington. Classes for ages 3mo-18yrs, from recreational to competitive levels.
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Huntington, NY Sign up for Classes in Huntington 266 East Pulaski Rd, Greenlawn, NY 11740 Phone: (631) 427-8275 Email: huntington@gmgc.com SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS The Gold Medal Huntington Experience Welcome to Gold Medal Gymnastics Center of Huntington, Long Island ; part of the renowned Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja family. We have been developing young athletes across Long Island since 1973. Our Huntington (Greenlawn) facility is one of 7 state of the art gyms that combine over half a century of gymnastics excellence in a modern, unparalleled environment for children to grow, learn, and excel. Included in each gym is our premier Gold Medal Ninja training course. Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG Our recently renovated 12,000-square-foot facility on the Huntington/Greenlawn border, stands as a testament to our commitment to athletic excellence and childhood development. We've created specialized training spaces that cater to every stage of a child's journey, from their first forward roll to advanced competitive routines. What distinguishes our Huntington/Greenlawn location is the exceptional caliber of our coaching staff. Our program directors bring together Olympic-level expertise and dedicated teaching experience. Under the leadership of a former USSR National Team member and Master of Sport, our athletes receive world-class instruction that has guided numerous students to national championships and prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Huntington Location and Directions Our Huntington facility is conveniently located at 266 East Pulaski Road in Greenlawn, offering easy access for families throughout the area. Hours of Operation Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM Saturday: 8:30 AM - 2:00 PM Summer hours: vary The facility features ample parking and a welcoming environment for both athletes and families. Contact Information Phone: (631) 427-8275 Email: huntington@gmgc.com Address: 266 East Pulaski Rd, Greenlawn, NY 11740 From Eastern Long Island Long Island Expressway (495) to route 231 Deer Park Avenue (exit 51), make right at the exit light (north). Take Deer Park Avenue for approximately 2 miles and fork left under the bridge at the firehouse. The road will change to Park Avenue. Take Park Avenue approximately 2 more miles to Pulaski Road (CitiBank on the corner), make a right onto Pulaski Road, gym immediately on left next to CitiBank. Parking on far left side of building. Look for big blue awning From NYC, Upstate, Nassau Long Island Expressway East (495) to route 231 Dear Park Avenue (exit 51), make a left at the exit light (north). Take Deer Park Avenue for approximately 2 miles and fork left under the bridge at the firehouse. The road will change to Park Avenue. Take Park Avenue approximately 2 more miles to Pulaski Road (CitiBank on the corner), make a right onto Pulaski Road, gym immediately on left next to CitiBank. Parking on far left side of building. Look for big blue awning. July & August Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 1:00pm Saturday: Closed Sunday: Closed for Parties Fall Hours Monday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Tuesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Wednesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Thursday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Friday: 9:15am – 7:30pm Saturday: 8:00am – 2:00pm Sunday: Closed for Parties Gymnastics Classes Offered in Huntington Our comprehensive program selection at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja of Huntington, NY, ensures every child finds their perfect path to athletic achievement. From preschool gymnastics to advanced competitive training, our programs are designed to develop strong, confident athletes. Preschool Gymnastics Our award-winning preschool gymnastics program creates an enriching environment where children ages 3 months to 6 years develop fundamental movement skills. We combine structured activities with imaginative play to establish strong foundations for future athletic success. Programs include Parent & Tot/Mommy & Me classes, Bronze Babies, and Super Silvers. Enroll Now - Preschool Gymnastics Classes Recreational Gymnastics Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja’s recreational gymnastics classes of Huntington foster physical literacy through expert instruction for children ages 5 and above. Each 90-minute class builds strength, flexibility, and confidence while maintaining an atmosphere of enjoyment and achievement. Our recreational program includes instruction on all Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, floor exercise, and vault. Enroll Now - Recreational Gymnastics Classes Advanced Gymnastics Our advanced gymnastics programs carry forward Gold Medal’s tradition of excellence under the guidance of our USAG Head Coach. From Mini-Team to Elite training, we provide pathways for every aspiring competitive gymnast. Our advanced programs have successfully placed athletes in prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Enroll Now - Advanced Gymnastics Classes Ninja Warrior Training Our innovative ninja warrior program represents the evolution of athletic training at Gold Medal. Combining gymnastics fundamentals with obstacle course challenges, we’ve created an exciting environment where children build both physical capabilities and mental resilience. Programs are available for all ages, from Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years) to Advanced Ninja training. Enroll Now - Ninja Warrior Classes Tumbling & Trampoline Perfect for cheerleaders, dancers, and athletes, our tumbling program focuses on essential acrobatic elements. Under expert guidance, students progress through beginner flipping class, advanced flipping class, and Dancenastics, mastering skills like back handsprings and aerials. Our state-of-the-art facility includes spring floors, professional trampolines, and foam pits for safe skill progression. Enroll Now - Tumbling Classes Exclusive Programs Experience personalized instruction tailored to your child’s specific goals with our exclusive One-on-One classes or create your own Mini Group (2-4 students) with friends. These customized sessions allow students to focus on their chosen skills and events, with flexible scheduling during off-peak hours. Perfect for accelerated learning or focused skill development. Enroll Now - Private Gymnastics Classes Huntington Photo Gallery What Huntington Families Say About Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the experiences of our Gold Medal families. Recent reviews from local parents consistently highlight our facility's impact. Parents consistently praise our experienced coaching staff, notably celebrating the patient and enthusiastic guidance in our preschool program and the technical expertise in our competitive tracks. Families particularly value our large, bright and newly renovated facility and the visible progress their children achieve. Many reviews emphasize how our programs have enhanced their children's confidence, strength, and social skills, with several families noting years of continued enrollment and multiple children participating in our programs. Huntington Gymnastics Classes SIGN UP FOR CLASSES > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > Join Our Email List STAY IN THE LOOP > Follow Us on Instagram GET CONNECTED > Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers world-class training with coaches, trainers, and support staff dedicated to helping gymnasts of all levels achieve their best. We proudly support aspiring gymnasts across seven locations in New York and New Jersey. Our programs include preschool classes, advanced classes, recreational gymnastics, ninja lessons, tumbling and trampoline lessons, as well as camps, events, birthday parties, and professional competitive teams. Centereach Garden City Huntington Levittown Rocky Point Smithtown Short Hills, NJ

children.title: PreSchool Programs - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: PreSchool Programs - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: PRE-SCHOOL GYMNASTICS Our preschool gym (Pregym) program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our specialized preschool area's have the latest "kid-sized" version of gymnastics equipment for classes run by our highly trained instructors. Classes are designed to increase physical strength, develop motor skills, and channel all of their energy! Children are divided into groups based on age, maturity, and skill level. Classes will boost their self-esteem and self-confidence through our positive and encouraging teaching techniques. AGES 3 MONTHS TO 6 YEARS FUN & STRUCTURED LEARNING STATE OF THE ART PRE-EQUIPMENT This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Crawling, Standing, & Walking Skills Building Body Strength Parent & Child Bonding Little Explorers prepares the students for the Bronze Babies Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, N Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! An introduction to the structure and discipline of preschool and gymnastics classes. This class creates a safe environment for your child to jump on the trampoline, climb on rock walls, zoom down slides, and hang on bars. Classes will include a small portion of structured gymnastics and a large portion of fun, games, music, and open play. Watch your child grow to love physical activity and see their attention span develop more and more each class. Activities will include bubble time, parachute fun, foam pit games, belt flying, and much more! This class is a great opportunity for parents to bond with each other and their children. Open Play Environment Balance, Coordination & Flexibility Music, Climbing, Games & More Parent & Child Bonding Busy Bees prepares your child for either the Bronze Babies or Silver Stars Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Structured Class Setting Motor Skill Development Take Turns & Sharing Parent & Child Bonding Bronze Babies prepares the students for Silver Stars Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This 55-minute pre-school gym program teaches basic gymnastics integrated into a fun game-like environment this class introduces parental separation fostering independence and self-esteem. Every class starts off with a musical warm-up and stretch to motivate and introduce gymnastics. Children will be taught two Olympic events such as beam and bars long with various jumps on the trampoline. Every week the children learn new skills including cartwheels, handstands, forward rolls, backward rolls, jumps, vaulting, and more. Through these exercise’s they’ll gain strength, balance, flexibility, coordination, and self-esteem. Becoming More Independent Increase Self Esteem & Confidence Balance, Strength, & Flexibility Silver Stars prepares students for either the Super Silvers, Intro to Rec, or Girls Gymnastics Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & Rock wall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Contact the office for more details! Intro to Rec. prepares students for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This pre-school gym program is for kids who have mastered the basics in their preschool classes. Kids are challenged even more in the same nurturing environment. Emphasis on using correct form and increasing strength prepares your gymnast for the Gold Medalist program. Gymnasts are introduced to levels 1 and 2 of the USAG Junior Olympic Program. They start to go on the larger gymnastics equipment at an earlier age. Preschool gym students begin to connect skills in a row while adding perfect form and posture to their gymnastics. Class is 90 minutes and includes trampoline. **Evaluation is required to enroll** Contact the office for more details! Super Silvers prepares your child for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This preschool gym program is designed for children who show a special interest and wish to pursue gymnastics as a sport. Developing the core basics for a gymnast is crucial to their success in the Junior Olympic program. Gymnasts in this program will learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 3 including all the latest training techniques that are set forth by the USAG National staff. These classes are more physically challenging while maintaining a fun game-like environment. Kids learn more advanced gymnastics skills and gain a sense of pride in their accomplishments. They have the option in participating in their own beginner-level gymnastic competition! This competition is labeled a “fun meet” because it is an unofficial exhibition designed to give athletes a positive experience when they perform in front of a crowd. The classes are 2 hours and meet twice a week. **Evaluation is required** Contact the office for more details! Gold Medalist prepares students for the Mini/Pre Team or the Accelerated Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Get some friends together and have your next playdate at Gold Medal Gymnastics Center. Enjoy a supervised open play atmosphere on our state of the art equipment. Ask our office for details. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule Watch our Pre-Schoolers in action! Our preschool gym program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our state of the art facilities are kid-sized and run by highly trained instructors. Gold Medal Ninja BOOK NOW > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > The Best Birthday Parties! LEARN MORE > Summer Programs SIGN UP NOW >

children.title: Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. children.title: Recreational Gymnastics - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Recreational Gymnastics - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: RECREATIONAL GYMNASTICS If you want your child to learn cores skills to help them in every sport, then the recreation program is a great place to start. All classes are structured around making every child stronger, more flexible, and to improve overall coordination. Our fun & positive learning system creates an atmosphere of encouragement and excitement to keep the children engaged during the entire class. Your child will learn at their own pace on all of the olympic events, make lasting friendships, and build their self esteem with every skill they achieve! AGES 5 YEARS AND UP GREAT FOR BOYS AND GIRLS STATE OF THE ART FACILITIES World class programs, held in our state of the art facilities for boys and girls ages 5 and up. Watch our video to learn more! This recreational gymnastics class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & rockwall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Early Introduction to Recreational Gymnastics Learn basic skills and safety with full size bars, beams & vault Introduces skills for tumbling, trampoline, tumble trak & rockwall Intro to Rec. prepares students for Girls Gymnastics Class or Accelerated Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Beginner & Intermediate This 90-minute class is based on the 4 Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting and floor exercise. Each week kids will be learning new skills in our state of the art facilities. Lesson plans are designed to keep kids moving the entire class, improving their over-all fitness and keeping it fun! Gold Medal offers a nurturing environment where students are encouraged to progress at their own unique pace: from forward rolls and cartwheels to front and back handsprings. Lessons always include trampoline or tumble track. Kids increase their flexibility and strength, boost their self-esteem, and gain a sense of pride in their achievements. Classes are 90 minutes long and are divided into groups with their friends and also by age and ability. Class focuses on balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting & floor exercise Increases flexibility, strength and boosts self esteem while having fun Great for all sports Learn forward rolls, cartwheels, front and back handsprings Kids are grouped with friends by age and ability Girls Gymnastics prepares students for Accelerated Gymnastics. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! children.title: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes in Levittown, NY | Gold Medal Gymnastics
children.description: Join us at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja's state-of-the-art facility in Levittown. Classes for ages 3mo-18yrs, from recreational to competitive levels.
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Levittown, NY Sign up for Classes in Levittown 210 Gardiners Avenue, Levittown, NY 11756 Phone: (516) 735-GOLD (4653) Email: levittown@gmgc.com SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS The Gold Medal Levittown Experience Welcome to Gold Medal Gymnastics Center of Levittown, Long Island; part of the renowned Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja family. We have been developing young athletes across Long Island since 1973. Our Levittown facility is one of 7 state-of-the-art gyms that combine over half a century of gymnastics excellence in a modern, unparalleled environment for children to grow, learn, and excel. Included in each gym is our premier Gold Medal Ninja training course. Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG Our expansive facility in Levittown stands as a testament to our commitment to athletic excellence and childhood development. We've created specialized training spaces that cater to every stage of a child's journey, from their first forward roll to advanced competitive routines. What distinguishes our Levittown location is the exceptional caliber of our coaching staff and comprehensive program offerings. Our instructors bring together years of expertise and dedicated teaching experience, guiding students from infant development through elite competitive training. Under their guidance, countless athletes have developed not just gymnastics skills, but life-long confidence, discipline, and physical fitness. Levittown Location and Directions Our Levittown facility is conveniently located at 210 Gardiners Avenue, offering easy access for families throughout Nassau County and the surrounding areas. Contact Information Phone: (516) 735-GOLD (4653) Email: levittown@gmgc.com Address: 266 East Pulaski Rd, Greenlawn, NY 11740 From NYC, Queens & Western Nassau Take Southern State Parkway East to Wantagh State Parkway North. Exit at W6 (Hempstead Turnpike), turn left (west) onto Hempstead Turnpike. Continue for approximately 2 miles to Gardiners Avenue, turn right (north). Gold Medal Gymnastics will be on your right side after approximately 0.5 miles at 210 Gardiners Avenue. Parking available in front of building. Look for Gold Medal Gymnastics signage. From Northern Nassau County Take Bethpage State Parkway South to Southern State Parkway East. Take Southern State to Wantagh State Parkway North. Exit at W6 (Hempstead Turnpike), turn left (west) onto Hempstead Turnpike. Continue for approximately 2 miles to Gardiners Avenue, turn right (north). Gold Medal Gymnastics will be on your right side after approximately 0.5 miles at 210 Gardiners Avenue. Parking available in front of building. Look for Gold Medal Gymnastics signage. July & August Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 1:00pm Saturday: Closed Sunday: Closed for Parties Fall Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Saturday: 8:30am – 2:00pm Sunday: Closed for Parties Gymnastics Classes Offered in Levittown Our comprehensive program selection at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja of Levittown, NY, ensures every child finds their perfect path to athletic achievement. From preschool gymnastics to advanced competitive training, our programs are designed to develop strong, confident athletes. Preschool Gymnastics Our award-winning preschool gymnastics program creates an enriching environment where children ages 3 months to 6 years develop fundamental movement skills. We combine structured activities with imaginative play to establish strong foundations for future athletic success. Programs include Parent & Tot/Mommy & Me classes, Bronze Babies, and Super Silvers. Enroll Now - Preschool Gymnastics Classes Recreational Gymnastics Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja’s recreational gymnastics classes of Levittown foster physical literacy through expert instruction for children ages 5 and above. Each 90-minute class builds strength, flexibility, and confidence while maintaining an atmosphere of enjoyment and achievement. Our recreational program includes instruction on all Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, floor exercise, and vault. Enroll Now - Recreational Gymnastics Classes Advanced Gymnastics Our advanced gymnastics programs carry forward Gold Medal’s tradition of excellence under the guidance of our USAG Head Coach. From Mini-Team to Elite training, we provide pathways for every aspiring competitive gymnast. Our advanced programs have successfully placed athletes in prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Enroll Now - Advanced Gymnastics Classes Ninja Warrior Training Our innovative ninja warrior program represents the evolution of athletic training at Gold Medal. Combining gymnastics fundamentals with obstacle course challenges, we’ve created an exciting environment where children build both physical capabilities and mental resilience. Programs are available for all ages, from Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years) to Advanced Ninja training. Enroll Now - Ninja Warrior Classes Tumbling & Trampoline Perfect for cheerleaders, dancers, and athletes, our tumbling program focuses on essential acrobatic elements. Under expert guidance, students progress through beginner flipping class, advanced flipping class, and Dancenastics, mastering skills like back handsprings and aerials. Our state-of-the-art facility includes spring floors, professional trampolines, and foam pits for safe skill progression. Enroll Now - Tumbling Classes Exclusive Programs Experience personalized instruction tailored to your child’s specific goals with our exclusive One-on-One classes or create your own Mini Group (2-4 students) with friends. These customized sessions allow students to focus on their chosen skills and events, with flexible scheduling during off-peak hours. Perfect for accelerated learning or focused skill development. Enroll Now - Private Gymnastics Classes Levittown Photo Gallery What Levittown Families Say About Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the experiences of our Gold Medal families. Recent reviews from local parents consistently highlight our facility's impact. Parents consistently praise our experienced coaching staff, notably celebrating the patient and enthusiastic guidance in our preschool program and the technical expertise in our competitive tracks. Families particularly value our large, bright and newly renovated facility and the visible progress their children achieve. Many reviews emphasize how our programs have enhanced their children's confidence, strength, and social skills, with several families noting years of continued enrollment and multiple children participating in our programs. Levittown Gymnastics Classes SIGN UP FOR CLASSES > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > Join Our Email List STAY IN THE LOOP > Follow Us on Instagram GET CONNECTED > Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers world-class training with coaches, trainers, and support staff dedicated to helping gymnasts of all levels achieve their best. We proudly support aspiring gymnasts across seven locations in New York and New Jersey. Our programs include preschool classes, advanced classes, recreational gymnastics, ninja lessons, tumbling and trampoline lessons, as well as camps, events, birthday parties, and professional competitive teams. Centereach Garden City Huntington Levittown Rocky Point Smithtown Short Hills, NJ
