children.title: PreSchool Programs - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: PreSchool Programs - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: PRE-SCHOOL GYMNASTICS Our preschool gym (Pregym) program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our specialized preschool area's have the latest "kid-sized" version of gymnastics equipment for classes run by our highly trained instructors. Classes are designed to increase physical strength, develop motor skills, and channel all of their energy! Children are divided into groups based on age, maturity, and skill level. Classes will boost their self-esteem and self-confidence through our positive and encouraging teaching techniques. AGES 3 MONTHS TO 6 YEARS FUN & STRUCTURED LEARNING STATE OF THE ART PRE-EQUIPMENT This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Crawling, Standing, & Walking Skills Building Body Strength Parent & Child Bonding Little Explorers prepares the students for the Bronze Babies Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, N Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! An introduction to the structure and discipline of preschool and gymnastics classes. This class creates a safe environment for your child to jump on the trampoline, climb on rock walls, zoom down slides, and hang on bars. Classes will include a small portion of structured gymnastics and a large portion of fun, games, music, and open play. Watch your child grow to love physical activity and see their attention span develop more and more each class. Activities will include bubble time, parachute fun, foam pit games, belt flying, and much more! This class is a great opportunity for parents to bond with each other and their children. Open Play Environment Balance, Coordination & Flexibility Music, Climbing, Games & More Parent & Child Bonding Busy Bees prepares your child for either the Bronze Babies or Silver Stars Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This is a 45 minutes class for the babies to start exploring our gym. They will start climbing, focus on taking some steps, bouncing with a parent on the trampolines, instruments, bubbles, and fun music! This class is made for parents and babies to play in a safe and fun environment! Contact the office for more details! Structured Class Setting Motor Skill Development Take Turns & Sharing Parent & Child Bonding Bronze Babies prepares the students for Silver Stars Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This 55-minute pre-school gym program teaches basic gymnastics integrated into a fun game-like environment this class introduces parental separation fostering independence and self-esteem. Every class starts off with a musical warm-up and stretch to motivate and introduce gymnastics. Children will be taught two Olympic events such as beam and bars long with various jumps on the trampoline. Every week the children learn new skills including cartwheels, handstands, forward rolls, backward rolls, jumps, vaulting, and more. Through these exercise’s they’ll gain strength, balance, flexibility, coordination, and self-esteem. Becoming More Independent Increase Self Esteem & Confidence Balance, Strength, & Flexibility Silver Stars prepares students for either the Super Silvers, Intro to Rec, or Girls Gymnastics Classes. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & Rock wall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Contact the office for more details! Intro to Rec. prepares students for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This pre-school gym program is for kids who have mastered the basics in their preschool classes. Kids are challenged even more in the same nurturing environment. Emphasis on using correct form and increasing strength prepares your gymnast for the Gold Medalist program. Gymnasts are introduced to levels 1 and 2 of the USAG Junior Olympic Program. They start to go on the larger gymnastics equipment at an earlier age. Preschool gym students begin to connect skills in a row while adding perfect form and posture to their gymnastics. Class is 90 minutes and includes trampoline. **Evaluation is required to enroll** Contact the office for more details! Super Silvers prepares your child for either the Girls Gymnastics Class or the Gold Medalist Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This preschool gym program is designed for children who show a special interest and wish to pursue gymnastics as a sport. Developing the core basics for a gymnast is crucial to their success in the Junior Olympic program. Gymnasts in this program will learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 3 including all the latest training techniques that are set forth by the USAG National staff. These classes are more physically challenging while maintaining a fun game-like environment. Kids learn more advanced gymnastics skills and gain a sense of pride in their accomplishments. They have the option in participating in their own beginner-level gymnastic competition! This competition is labeled a “fun meet” because it is an unofficial exhibition designed to give athletes a positive experience when they perform in front of a crowd. The classes are 2 hours and meet twice a week. **Evaluation is required** Contact the office for more details! Gold Medalist prepares students for the Mini/Pre Team or the Accelerated Program. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Get some friends together and have your next playdate at Gold Medal Gymnastics Center. Enjoy a supervised open play atmosphere on our state of the art equipment. Ask our office for details. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule Watch our Pre-Schoolers in action! Our preschool gym program provides a nurturing pre-school environment for your child. Our state of the art facilities are kid-sized and run by highly trained instructors. children.title: Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. Your birthday party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Child too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. Call for more information or Book Now: CALL TODAY! These parties teach basic skills from our trained Ninja Staff, utilizing our state-of-the-art equipment with fun challenging obstacle courses! We set up courses for time and speed so that you can test your strength and compete with your friends in a fun and safe space! A Ninja Birthday Party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Ninja too!! children.title: Recreational Gymnastics - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Recreational Gymnastics - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: RECREATIONAL GYMNASTICS If you want your child to learn cores skills to help them in every sport, then the recreation program is a great place to start. All classes are structured around making every child stronger, more flexible, and to improve overall coordination. Our fun & positive learning system creates an atmosphere of encouragement and excitement to keep the children engaged during the entire class. Your child will learn at their own pace on all of the olympic events, make lasting friendships, and build their self esteem with every skill they achieve! AGES 5 YEARS AND UP GREAT FOR BOYS AND GIRLS STATE OF THE ART FACILITIES World class programs, held in our state of the art facilities for boys and girls ages 5 and up. Watch our video to learn more! This recreational gymnastics class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & rockwall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Early Introduction to Recreational Gymnastics Learn basic skills and safety with full size bars, beams & vault Introduces skills for tumbling, trampoline, tumble trak & rockwall Intro to Rec. prepares students for Girls Gymnastics Class or Accelerated Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Beginner & Intermediate This 90-minute class is based on the 4 Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting and floor exercise. Each week kids will be learning new skills in our state of the art facilities. Lesson plans are designed to keep kids moving the entire class, improving their over-all fitness and keeping it fun! Gold Medal offers a nurturing environment where students are encouraged to progress at their own unique pace: from forward rolls and cartwheels to front and back handsprings. Lessons always include trampoline or tumble track. Kids increase their flexibility and strength, boost their self-esteem, and gain a sense of pride in their achievements. Classes are 90 minutes long and are divided into groups with their friends and also by age and ability. Class focuses on balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting & floor exercise Increases flexibility, strength and boosts self esteem while having fun Great for all sports Learn forward rolls, cartwheels, front and back handsprings Kids are grouped with friends by age and ability Girls Gymnastics prepares students for Accelerated Gymnastics. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! children.title: Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. Your birthday party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Child too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. Call for more information or Book Now: CALL TODAY! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule BOOK NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Ninja Parties How about an awesome birthday party for that little Ninja! These parties teach basic skills from our trained Ninja Staff, utilizing our state-of-the-art equipment with fun challenging obstacle courses! We set up courses for time and speed so that you can test your strength and compete with your friends in a fun and safe space! A Ninja Birthday Party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Ninja too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. children.title: Rocky Point Gymnastics Classes & Training | Gold Medal Gymnastics Center
children.description: Join Gold Medal Gymnastics Center in Rocky Point, NY, for gymnastics classes and training. Programs for all ages and skill levels. Call (631) 821-2100 to enroll today!
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Rocky Point, NY SIGN UP FOR CLASSES AT THIS LOCATION 291 Route 25A, Rocky Point, 11778 SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS Phone: (631) 821-2100 Email: rockypoint@gmgc.com Classes offered at this location: Preschool Gymnastics: Bronze Babies (walking to 3 years): Parent-assisted classes Super Silvers (3-5 years): Basic gymnastics in a fun environment Little Explorers (3-12 months): Introductory class for babies Click here to sign up! Recreational Gymnastics: Intro to Rec (5 years): 5 year olds will get an early introduction to gymnastics equipment Girls Gymnastics (6 years+): 90 minute program focusing on 4 olympic events Girls & Boys Gymnastics (6-18 years): Focuses on flexibility, strength, and self-esteem Gold Medal Ninja: High-energy classes for children up to 12 years old Click here to sign up! Advanced Gymnastics: Gold Medalists (5-7 years): Learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 2 & 3 Mini-Team (5-8 years): Introduction to competitive gymnastics training while in a fun environment Pre-Team (8+years): Master new skills at an accelerated pace High School Group Program (14+ years): Opportunity for high school students to utilize our space to practice Click here to sign up! Specialized Gymnastics: Tumbling and Trampoline: Concentrates on floor skills and aerial techniques Dancenastics: Focuses on tumbling and acrobatic skills used in dance Beginner Flipping Class: Build strength, balance and flexibility Advanced Flipping Class: Learn how to do a back tuck, side aerials and layouts Click here to sign up! Ninja Classes: Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years): basic ninja classes Little Ninja (3-5 years): introductory ninja classes Ninja Kids (6 years+): Learn flips, bars, parkour and more Advanced Ninja (6 years+): Advanced obstacle course training Ninja Teams: tournament style ninja competition Warrior Tumbling Class: Ninja warrior inspired experience with obstacle courses Click here to sign up! The Garden City location also offers birthday parties , summer camps , and special events throughout the year. July & August Office Hours: Monday 9:00 am – 8:30 pm Tuesday 9:00 am – 9:00 pm Wednesday 9:00 am – 9:00 pm Thursday 9:00 am – 9:00 pm Friday 9:00 am – 1:30 pm Saturday Closed for parties Sunday Closed Fall Office Hours: Monday 9:00 am – 8:00 pm Tuesday 9:00 am – 8:00 pm Wednesday 9:00 am – 8:00 pm Thursday 9:00 am – 8:30 pm Friday 9:00 am – 9:00 pm Saturday 8:00 am – 4:00 pm Sunday Closed for parties Directions From Eastern Long Island: Long Island Expressway (495) to exit 68 North (William Floyd Parkway). Exit in 7.7 miles to Route 25A West (bear Left) From NYC, Upstate, Nassau: Long Island Expressway East (495) to Exit 63 North (N. Ocean Ave). Follow 8.5 miles to end. Make Right on 25A (east). 291 Route 25A, Rocky Point, 11778 Phone (631) 821-2100

children.title: Short Hills Gymnastics Classes & Training | Gold Medal Gymnastics Center
children.description: Join our exceptional gymnastics classes and training in Short Hills, NJ, at GMGC. Offering programs for all ages and skill levels. Call (862) 398-4653 to enroll today!
children.content: WELCOME TO GMGC SHORT HILLS For over 50 years, Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers has been the premier gymnastics facility on Long Island, dedicated to providing quality fitness experiences for kids of all ages and skill levels. Fall 2024 marks the exciting opening of our first GMGC location in New Jersey, situated in Short Hills. This expansion marks an exciting milestone to the GMGC family of gyms, bringing our renowned programs and certified instructors to the vibrant community of Short Hills. Our commitment to fostering athletic skills in a positive environment, goal setting, and achievement remains steadfast as we expand into new communities. Join us at GMGC for an unparalleled gymnastics experience... Come visit GMGC for a tour! Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG STAY UP TO DATE! JOIN THE LIST! FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK! QUESTIONS? EMAIL US! FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM! Our success over the years comes from our desire to give every student a quality learning experience. All our classes maintain a low student to teacher ratio and are taught by certified instructors. Gymnastics teaches not only athletic skills but also goal setting and achievement. Classes at GMGC are structured to build upper & lower body strength, balance, flexibility, and coordination. Our fun learning environments consist of a huge state-of-the-art gymnastics facility with fully equipped girls & boys gymnastics equipment, inground trampolines, a tumble track, numerous landing mats, inground foam pits, plus overhead spotting belts. All our facilities are cleaned and sterilized daily. • PRESCHOOL PROGRAMS • RECREATIONAL GYMNASTICS • ADVANCED GYMNASTICS • TUMBLING & TRAMPOLINE • GOLD MEDAL NINJA • SUMMER CAMP & CLASSES — • BIRTHDAY PARTIES • NINJA PARTIES • ULTIMATE NINJA CHALLENGE • SPECIAL EVENTS SIGN UP FOR CLASSES CONTACT US TODAY DOWNLOAD NJ SPECIAL EVENTS CALENDAR DOWNLOAD NJ BILLING SCHEDULE Take a 3D virtual tour of our new state-of-the-art facility - everything your child will want to have an amazing, fun, learning experience! • Uneven Bars • Ninja Rig • Warp Wall • Climbing Wall • Trampolines • Gymnastic Mats • Foam Pit • ...and so much more! WATCH NOW Directions: On Route 24. 3 miles away from Short Hills Mall. 750a Morris Turnpike, Short Hills, NJ 07078 Phone: (862) 398-4653 Gold Medal Ninja BOOK NOW > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > The Best Birthday Parties! LEARN MORE > Summer Programs SIGN UP NOW >

children.title: Gold Medal Gymnastics: Unforgettable Birthday Parties!
children.description: Make your child's birthday unforgettable with Gold Medal Gymnastics! Our exciting birthday parties offer fun activities and expert supervision for an amazing celebration!
children.content: BIRTHDAY PARTIES! GMGC is the perfect place to have your child’s birthday party! Gold Medal Gymnastics Centers are designed for physical activity and epic fun in a safe environment! You can choose from packaged parties or custom parties… only limited by your imagination! Make your child’s birthday extra special with a lifetime of memories at Gold Medal Gymnastics! Their friends will thank you too! AGES 3-12 YEARS ACTION PACKED GYMNASTICS PARTIES STATE OF THE ART NINJA PARTIES Gymnastics Parties Enjoy an action-packed, fun-filled gymnastics-themed birthday party. Trained professional staff will lead the children through gymnastics activities & instruction which include an obstacle course, parachute fun, trampoline, and more. Your birthday party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Child too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. Call for more information or Book Now: CALL TODAY! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule BOOK NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Ninja Parties How about an awesome birthday party for that little Ninja! These parties teach basic skills from our trained Ninja Staff, utilizing our state-of-the-art equipment with fun challenging obstacle courses! We set up courses for time and speed so that you can test your strength and compete with your friends in a fun and safe space! A Ninja Birthday Party is one hour in our gymnastic facility and a half-hour in our party area for food and cake after. Food & Drinks NOT Included. Special Surprise for our Birthday Ninja too!! Parties are usually held on Sundays during the school year and Saturdays during the summer. We recommend booking 4 months in advance. Deposit is nonrefundable. children.title: Advanced Gymnastic - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Advanced Gymnastic - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: ADVANCED GYMNASTICS Everybody needs challenges to grow and especially gymnasts! Our Advanced programs are tailored towards the commitment level of the athlete and the parents. Some gymnasts prefer to learn at their own pace with as little as 1 day a week for class, others prefer to learn faster by adding multiple days and working towards one of our team programs. Contact our office for an evaluation to see which of the following programs would be best for your child. AGES 4 YEARS TO 15 YEARS ALL THE LATEST TRAINING TECHNIQUES STATE OF THE ART FACILITIES This class is for kids who have mastered the basics in their preschool classes. Kids are challenged even more in the same nurturing environment. Emphasis on using correct form, and increasing strength prepares your gymnast for the Gold Medalist program. Gymnasts are introduced to levels 1 and 2 of the USAG Junior Olympic Program. They start to go on the larger gymnastics equipment at an earlier age. Students begin to connect skills in a row while adding perfect form and posture to their gymnastics. Class is 90 minutes and includes trampoline. **Evaluation is required to enroll** Start on larger equipment at a younger age Emphasis on correcting form and posture to perfection Introduction of strength & conditioning skills Super Silvers prepares students for Gold Medalists or Accelerated Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This class is designed for children who show a special interest and wish to pursue gymnastics as a sport. Developing the core basics for a gymnast is crucial to their success in the Junior Olympic program. Gymnasts in this program will learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 3 including all the latest training techniques that are set forth by the USAG National staff. These classes are more physically challenging while maintaining a fun game-like environment. Kids learn more advanced gymnastics skills and gain a sense of pride in their accomplishments. They have the option in participating in their own beginner level gymnastic competition! This competition is labeled a “fun meet” because it is an unofficial exhibition designed to give athletes a positive experience when they perform in front of a crowd. Classes are 2 hours and meet twice a week. Learn the fundamentals of USAG Level 2 & 3 Learn more advanced gymnastics skills Gain a sense of pride in accomplishments The option to participate in a "Fun Meet" to gain experience Gold Medalists prepares students for Mini-Team/Pre-Team. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Mini-Team is an introduction to competitive gymnastics training while still maintaining a fun environment. Students in this program are taught a solid foundation of basic skills from which future advanced skills can be built upon. Kids will even participate in their own beginner level gymnastic competition each year! This competition is labeled “a fun meet” because it is an unofficial exhibition designed to give the athletes a positive experience when they perform in front of a crowd. All parents must purchase the required uniform when entering this program. **Evaluation is required before entering this program** Introduction to competitive gymnastics training while in a fun environment Taught solid foundation of basic skills which advanced skills can be built upon Participate in a "Fun Meet" to gain experience Mini-Team and Pre-Team prepares students for Twisting Class (only available at select location). CALL TODAY! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule These 2 hour classes offer students a chance to master new skills at an accelerated pace. Girls can learn tumbling for their school sports such as cheerleading…etc. Kids choose how many days a week they practice and workouts include increased conditioning and gymnastics. Girl’s groups will have extra dance elements introduced into their workouts. Students are divided into groups with their friends and with other kids of their skill level. The accelerated program is a non-competitive program. Girls in this program may work towards qualifying for the USAG Junior Olympic Team or the IGC Team. However, being a member of a competitive team program is NOT required. **Evaluation is required before entering this program* * Master new skills at an accelerated pace Learn tumbling & build strength for school sports Girls will have extra dance elements introduced, boys will learn rings, pommels and p-bars. Accelerated Class prepares students for Club Team. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This program gives High School students the opportunity to rent out and utilize our state of the art gym for team practices or group activities. Teams have the option to bring their own coach or to use one of our trained instructors. Gold Medal features 15′-18′ ceilings perfect for your squad or team. The opportunity for high school students to utilize our space to practice Teams can bring their coach or use one of our trained instructors 15' -18' ceiling which is great for your cheerleading squad to practice! Prepares students for Cheerleading Squads. Contact our office manager for details: CALL TODAY! Centereach, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 981-4653 to schedule Garden City, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 357-3636 to schedule Huntington, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 427-8275 to schedule Levittown, NY: Please call the Gym at (516) 735-4653 to schedule Rocky Point, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 821-2100 to schedule Smithtown, NY: Please call the Gym at (631) 366-4653 to schedule Short Hills, NJ - NEW!: Please call the Gym at (862) 398-4653 to schedule Gold Medal Ninja BOOK NOW > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > The Best Birthday Parties! children.title: Bounce to Fun & Fitness: Tumbling Trampoline Classes
children.description: Discover the joy of bouncing to fun and fitness with our tumbling trampoline classes! Join us for an exhilarating experience that combines exercise and entertainment.
children.content: TUMBLING & TRAMPOLINE Does your child want to primarily focus on tumbling skills instead of all the olympic events? Tumbling skills are now a major requirement for multiple activities such as cheerleading, martial arts, competitive dance, diving, & more! Classes are structured around the major skills like Back handsprings, flipping, and twisting. Classes are taught on our spring floors, trampolines and tumble tracks. Take advantage of all our safety equipment like our overhead spotting rigs and foam pits. OPTIMIZED FOR CHEERLEADERS ADVANCED LEVEL COACHES STATE OF THE ART EQUIPMENT From Back Handsprings to Flipping and Twisting, all aspects of Tumbling are covered in these programs. View this video to learn more! Most needed skill by all high school squads, this class focuses on drills and strength building to learn a back handspring on the floor. Build strength, balance and flexibility Learn skills needed for High School Squads Back Handspring Class prepares students for Flipping Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ- NEW! Students who can do a back handspring by themselves can enter this class to add a back tuck to their tumbling. Drills designed to target back and front flips, twisting, side aerials, and layouts. Learn how to do a back tuck, side aerials and layouts ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This hour long class focuses on the tumbling and acrobatic skills used in dance. In this class students will learn walkovers, aerials, back handsprings, etc. Emphasis on core strength and flexibility. Learn tumbling and acrobatic skills used for dance Builds core strength and flexibility Dancenastics prepares students for Dance Teams outside of Gold Medal Gymnastics. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! This program offers a ninja warrior inspired experience through challenging but fun obstacle course training. This program will instill basic strength, balance, hand-eye coordination along with technique and speed. There will be a variation of new obstacle courses that will be used in this class inspired by the popular events on TV. Instill basic strength, balance & hand eye coordination Learn to get through challenging obstacles with technique and speed Have fun feeling like a Ninja Warrior! Warrior Tumbling Class prepares students for Ninja Warrior Competitions. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! children.title: Customer Portal
Recreational Gymnastics - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Recreational Gymnastics - Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: RECREATIONAL GYMNASTICS If you want your child to learn cores skills to help them in every sport, then the recreation program is a great place to start. All classes are structured around making every child stronger, more flexible, and to improve overall coordination. Our fun & positive learning system creates an atmosphere of encouragement and excitement to keep the children engaged during the entire class. Your child will learn at their own pace on all of the olympic events, make lasting friendships, and build their self esteem with every skill they achieve! AGES 5 YEARS AND UP GREAT FOR BOYS AND GIRLS STATE OF THE ART FACILITIES World class programs, held in our state of the art facilities for boys and girls ages 5 and up. Watch our video to learn more! This recreational gymnastics class was created for 5-year-olds to get an early introduction to the larger gymnastics equipment. Children who are ready to move past the preschool fundamentals, but are not yet ready for the 90-minute recreational program, can enter this introductory class that is 60 minutes long with children their own age. During this class, they will be taught the basic skills & safety on using the full-size bars, beams, & vault. They will also be introduced to the next level of skills on tumbling, trampoline, tumble track & rockwall. This program is designed to maintain the fun preschool environment, without being restricted to just the preschool area and equipment. Children who are currently enrolled in preschool classes can ask their teachers if they are ready for this next step. Early Introduction to Recreational Gymnastics Learn basic skills and safety with full size bars, beams & vault Introduces skills for tumbling, trampoline, tumble trak & rockwall Intro to Rec. prepares students for Girls Gymnastics Class or Accelerated Class. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! Beginner & Intermediate This 90-minute class is based on the 4 Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting and floor exercise. Each week kids will be learning new skills in our state of the art facilities. Lesson plans are designed to keep kids moving the entire class, improving their over-all fitness and keeping it fun! Gold Medal offers a nurturing environment where students are encouraged to progress at their own unique pace: from forward rolls and cartwheels to front and back handsprings. Lessons always include trampoline or tumble track. Kids increase their flexibility and strength, boost their self-esteem, and gain a sense of pride in their achievements. Classes are 90 minutes long and are divided into groups with their friends and also by age and ability. Class focuses on balance beam, uneven bars, vaulting & floor exercise Increases flexibility, strength and boosts self esteem while having fun Great for all sports Learn forward rolls, cartwheels, front and back handsprings Kids are grouped with friends by age and ability Girls Gymnastics prepares students for Accelerated Gymnastics. ENROLL NOW! Centereach, NY Garden City, NY Huntington, NY Levittown, NY Rocky Point, NY Smithtown, NY Short Hills, NJ - NEW! children.content: PLAN YOUR FUN WITH EXCLUSIVE PROGRAMS! CUSTOM MADE CLASSES! PRIVATE INSTRUCTORS! MAKE YOUR OWN MINI GROUP Exclusive One-on-One Gymnastics or Ninja Classes are held during off peak times when there are fewer people in the facilities. Let your child enjoy a custom made class designed specifically for their ability. Students will have a private instructor do all of their favorite events and give them as many turns as they want! Coaches will pick specific drills and exercises the student needs or wants to achieve their goals. One on One Class in the gym is $55 per hour CALL TODAY! Now you can schedule your own class, chose who takes the class with you, and the group can choose what skills and events they want to focus on. The teacher will customize a lesson plan suitable to the entire group and geared to help each student reach their goals. Exclusive Mini Groups are held during off peak times when there are fewer people in the facilities. (Max 4 students) MINI-GROUPS are for 2-4 kids at $40 each child CALL TODAY! children.title: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes in Centereach, NY | Gold Medal Gymnastics
children.description: Join us at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja's state-of-the-art facility in Centereach. Classes for ages 3mo-18yrs, from recreational to competitive levels.
children.content: Gymnastics & Ninja Classes | Centereach, NY Sign up for Classes in Centereach 1752 Middle Country Road, Centereach, NY 11720 Phone: (631) 981-GOLD (4653) Email: centereach@gmgc.com SCROLL DOWN TO VIEW PHOTOS The Gold Medal Centereach Experience Welcome to Gold Medal Gymnastics Center of Centereach, Long Island; part of the renowned Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja family. We have been developing young athletes across Long Island since 1973. Our Centereach facility is one of 7 state of the art gyms that combine over half a century of gymnastics excellence in a modern, unparalleled environment for children to grow, learn, and excel. Included in each gym is our premier Gold Medal Ninja training course. Ages and Skill Levels: 3 months - 18 years • State-of-the-Art Facilities • Standard of Excellence Since 1973 • Safety-Certified Instructors • Competitive Team Programs: Club, USAIGC & USAG Our established facility at 1752 Middle Country Road in Centereach stands as a testament to our commitment to athletic excellence and childhood development. Conveniently located just off the Long Island Expressway at Exit 62, we've created specialized training spaces that cater to every stage of a child's journey, from their first forward roll to advanced competitive routines. What distinguishes our Centereach location is the exceptional caliber of our coaching staff and comprehensive program offerings. Our facility provides the full spectrum of Gold Medal programming, from our Little Explorers classes for babies as young as 3 months to our competitive team programs for advanced athletes. Under expert instruction, our athletes receive world-class training that has guided numerous students to national championships and prestigious university programs across the country. Centereach Location and Directions Our Centereach facility is conveniently located at 1752 Middle Country Road, offering easy access for families throughout Suffolk County and eastern Long Island Contact Information Phone: (631) 981-GOLD (4653) Email: centereach@gmgc.com Address: 1752 Middle Country Road, Centereach, NY 11720 From Eastern Long Island Long Island Expressway (495) to route 97 North Nicolls Rd (exit 62), Exit at Route 25 West, (Left on Middle Country Rd). Take Middle Country Rd for approximately 1/4 mile and gym will be on the left. From NYC, Upstate, Nassau Long Island Expressway East (495) to route 97 North Nicolls Rd (exit 62), Exit at Route 25 West,(Middle Country Rd). Take Middle Country Rd for approximately 1/4 mile and gym will be on the left. July & August Hours Monday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Tuesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Thursday: 9:00am – 8:00pm Friday: 9:00am – 1:00pm Saturday: Closed Sunday: Closed for Parties Fall Hours Monday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Tuesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Wednesday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Thursday: 9:15am – 8:30pm Friday: 9:15am – 7:30pm Saturday: 8:00am – 2:00pm Sunday: Closed for Parties Gymnastics Classes Offered in Centereach Our comprehensive program selection at Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja of Centereach, NY, ensures every child finds their perfect path to athletic achievement. From preschool gymnastics to advanced competitive training, our programs are designed to develop strong, confident athletes. Preschool Gymnastics Our award-winning preschool gymnastics program creates an enriching environment where children ages 3 months to 6 years develop fundamental movement skills. We combine structured activities with imaginative play to establish strong foundations for future athletic success. Programs include Parent & Tot/Mommy & Me classes, Bronze Babies, and Super Silvers. Enroll Now - Preschool Gymnastics Classes Recreational Gymnastics Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja’s recreational gymnastics classes of Centereach foster physical literacy through expert instruction for children ages 5 and above. Each 90-minute class builds strength, flexibility, and confidence while maintaining an atmosphere of enjoyment and achievement. Our recreational program includes instruction on all Olympic events: balance beam, uneven bars, floor exercise, and vault. Enroll Now - Recreational Gymnastics Classes Advanced Gymnastics Our advanced gymnastics programs carry forward Gold Medal’s tradition of excellence under the guidance of our USAG Head Coach. From Mini-Team to Elite training, we provide pathways for every aspiring competitive gymnast. Our advanced programs have successfully placed athletes in prestigious university programs, including Brown and Cornell Universities. Enroll Now - Advanced Gymnastics Classes Ninja Warrior Training Our innovative ninja warrior program represents the evolution of athletic training at Gold Medal. Combining gymnastics fundamentals with obstacle course challenges, we’ve created an exciting environment where children build both physical capabilities and mental resilience. Programs are available for all ages, from Ninja Babies (walking to 3 years) to Advanced Ninja training. Enroll Now - Ninja Warrior Classes Tumbling & Trampoline Perfect for cheerleaders, dancers, and athletes, our tumbling program focuses on essential acrobatic elements. Under expert guidance, students progress through beginner flipping class, advanced flipping class, and Dancenastics, mastering skills like back handsprings and aerials. Our state-of-the-art facility includes spring floors, professional trampolines, and foam pits for safe skill progression. Enroll Now - Tumbling Classes Exclusive Programs Experience personalized instruction tailored to your child’s specific goals with our exclusive One-on-One classes or create your own Mini Group (2-4 students) with friends. These customized sessions allow students to focus on their chosen skills and events, with flexible scheduling during off-peak hours. Perfect for accelerated learning or focused skill development. Enroll Now - Private Gymnastics Classes Centereach Photo Gallery What Centereach Families Say About Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the experiences of our Gold Medal families. Recent reviews from local parents consistently highlight our facility's impact. Parents consistently praise our experienced coaching staff, notably celebrating the patient and enthusiastic guidance in our preschool program and the technical expertise in our competitive tracks. Families particularly value our well-equipped facility and the visible progress their children achieve. Many reviews emphasize how our programs have enhanced their children's confidence, strength, and social skills, with several families noting years of continued enrollment and multiple children participating in our programs. Centereach Gymnastics Classes SIGN UP FOR CLASSES > Special Events SIGN UP NOW > Join Our Email List STAY IN THE LOOP > Follow Us on Instagram GET CONNECTED > Gold Medal Gymnastics & Ninja offers world-class training with coaches, trainers, and support staff dedicated to helping gymnasts of all levels achieve their best. We proudly support aspiring gymnasts across seven locations in New York and New Jersey. Our programs include preschool classes, advanced classes, recreational gymnastics, ninja lessons, tumbling and trampoline lessons, as well as camps, events, birthday parties, and professional competitive teams. Centereach Garden City Huntington Levittown Rocky Point Smithtown Short Hills, NJ

children.title: Our Gymnastics Team Programs - Gold Medal Gymnastics Center %
children.description: Gold Medal has 3 team programs for all types of athletes. Learn more about our gymnastics team programs by calling any of our six New York locations.
children.content: GMGC Gymnastics Team Programs Gold Medal has 3 gymnastics team programs for all types of athletes. Over the years we discover that gymnastics can be enjoyed as a sport no matter what the commitment level is, by the child, or by the parents. Some parents may not want to travel, some gymnasts may want to be in the gym only a couple times a week instead of all week long. Our CLUB TEAM is a local based program where each location has a team and they only compete within the Gold Medal family of 6 gyms. Parents and students love it! The requirements to join are very basic and attainable by most girls. Students in our 2hr advanced classes can be evaluated to join at any time. (see below for details) Our travel teams are called the “USA-IGC Program” and the “Junior Olympic Program”. Both programs have State, Regional, and National championships, however the IGC program is designed to require only 2-3 days per week allowing athletes to do other sports and activities. The IGC program is perfect for the gymnasts who want a low pressure fun environment to learn skills at their own pace. The Junior Olympic program can require 3-5 days a week, depending on the level, therefore prohibits the athletes from doing any other sports or activities. Many of our athletes have received full athletic scholarships to the top colleges in the country (see our hall of fame page ). Ask our directors which gymnastics team programs best suit your child. We look forward to helping your athletes grow and achieve their best! GMGC Hall of Fame Being part of a gymnastics team has tremendous benefits for the children of today. All of our gymnastics team programs teach goal setting and achievement, hard work and discipline, along with all the physical benefits that comes with the extra training. In addition to these key life lessons, the athletes also build long lasting relationships during a critical time in their growth. Parents these days feel very challenged to keep their kids on the right path as they reach the teenage years. Belonging to a team keeps them focused, away from distractions, and in a place they can grow with positive influence around them. Gold Medal Has been home to over 30 athletic scholarships to college. Past Scholarship Gymnasts Hall Of Fame & Scholarships USAG Travel Teams Girls USA Gymnastics Development Program Children who wish to pursue competitive gymnastics may train to qualify and join our Junior Olympic Team. Team gymnasts train year-round and are entered into competitions where they compete for scores against other gym clubs. Children are taught the importance of goal setting and teamwork. All gymnasts must compete on all four of the Olympic events. GMGC is currently one of the top competitive programs in the Northeastern United States. Many of our gymnasts have been successful on the National Level and several have received full athletic scholarships to college. More About Our Gymnastics Teams Travel Teams Optional Competitive Program Home of the 2017 World Champion Advanced gymnasts who like the extra training of a team program, but are not able to commit to the high demands of being in the Junior Olympic Program, may join our USAIGC college bound team program. Growing into a popular League to join, these gymnasts learn the importance of teamwork and dedication. Maximum training of 3 days per week which allows for other sports and activities. More About Our Gymnastics Teams Local In-House Teams Club Team This is an “In House” team which competes exclusively within the Gold Medal Family of gyms in a non pressured environment. This program prepares gymnast 8yrs and older for high school gymnastics teams. Each class is designed to shape and challenge gymnasts based on their personal strengths and weaknesses. It allows gymnasts to experience a competitive team program without additional travel, practice times and expenses.
